00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include <l4/sys/scheduler.h>
00027 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00028 
00029 namespace L4 {
00030 
00040 class Scheduler : public Kobject_t<Scheduler, Kobject, L4_PROTO_SCHEDULER>
00041 {
00042   L4_KOBJECT(Scheduler)
00043 
00044 public:
00049   l4_msgtag_t info(l4_umword_t *cpu_max, l4_sched_cpu_set_t *cpus,
00050                    l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00051   { return l4_scheduler_info_u(cap(), cpu_max, cpus, utcb); }
00052 
00057   l4_msgtag_t run_thread(Cap<Thread> const &thread,
00058                          l4_sched_param_t const &sp,
00059                          l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00060   { return l4_scheduler_run_thread_u(cap(), thread.cap(), &sp, utcb); }
00061 
00066   l4_msgtag_t idle_time(l4_sched_cpu_set_t const &cpus,
00067                         l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00068   { return l4_scheduler_idle_time_u(cap(), &cpus, utcb); }
00069 
00070 
00075   bool is_online(l4_umword_t cpu, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) const throw()
00076   { return l4_scheduler_is_online_u(cap(), cpu, utcb); }
00077 };
00078 }
